snippet.title: Bishoujo Senshi Sailor Moon Super S Sailor Moon to Hiragana Lesson! Playdia   1995
snippet.description:
😍🦄💕💝💕🦄🌜Bishoujo Senshi Sailor Moon Super S. 💕 . 
Sailor Moon to Hiragana Lesson! (Playdia - 1995)🌛🦄💕💝💕🦄

In 1994, Bandai released the Playdia Quick Interactive System. An 8-bit game console and first released on October 23, 1994. It was sold solely in Japan at a starting price of ¥ 24,800 yen.

Playdia titles are basically divided into "encyclopedias" and educational titles.

This game set in the period of Sailor Moon SuperS, the Sailor Scouts have gathered to teach ChibiMoon the ins and outs of the Japanese syllabary of Hiragana 

Source:.  https://www.neopancho.net/Playdia/smhiragana.html 

ExtraCut by: https://www.instagram.com/sailormoon_instaworld/
